name: gimbal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device with a circular part that turns around a fixed central axis (= straight line), used for keeping a compass, camera, or other piece of equipment in position when it is inside a moving vehicle or object: The platform is isolated from vehicle rotations by four gimbals.
bergamont/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesIn a spacecraft, rocket engines are usually mounted on a pair of gimbals.By carefully aligning the gimbal, there was a star visible in the eyepiece. Gimbal technology is used in steadicams to eliminate camera shake when filming.We used a gimbal-mounted mirror to reflect starlight into our telescope.
